text: John Alexander Fraser (18 March 1931 â€“ 7 November 2020) was a Scottish actor and author. He was best known for his roles in The Good Companions (1957), The Trials of Oscar Wilde (1960), El Cid (1961), Repulsion (1965) and Isadora (1968). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish television actors Category:Writers from Glasgow Category:Scottish stage actors Category:Actors from Glasgow
title: John Fraser (actor)
